posts.title: react-query
posts.body: React query is a very efficient query caching client for the front-end which can replace traditional methods of fetching data on the mounting stage of the component and global state management like Redux/MobX in some use cases.

posts.title: json-server
posts.body: Today we will look into a very handy tool json-server, which can give you a mock rest json server in a minute. In a regular enterprise application, you work with many teams and third party APIs. Imagine you have to call a third party restful web service that will get you JSON data to work on. You are in a tight schedule, so you canâ€™t wait for them to finish their work and then start your own. If you wish to have a mockup Rest Web service in place to get the demo data for you, then json-server is the tool you are looking for.

posts.title: ...Thinking about the immortality of the crab
posts.body: The phrase is usually a humorous way of saying that one was not sitting idly, but engaged constructively in contemplation or letting one's mind wander.
